quote: We buy a house every 13 minutes.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the scale and efficiency of New Western's operations.
suggested_hook: Ever wondered how often investment firms buy homes? Here's a surprising stat!

quote: You don't have to become an expert in real estate investment. You just have to see a house that you want to sell that would be really hard to list.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to explore investment opportunities without needing deep expertise.
suggested_hook: Think you need to be an investment expert to sell distressed properties? Think again!
